headline: Autumn in Australia: your best pictures
text: A stranger falls gently Photograph: Redzircon       Roxby Downs, South Australia Photograph: evilzombiedave       Chilly mornings in the inner west Photograph: Jill Summers       Autumn in Centennial Park Photograph: Michael Collins       Autumn, it's not all about the coloured leaves: a flowering emu bush.
